content: this chenille plush no-sew pocket dino crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for dinosaur lovers this is the ad-free printable pdf free pattern released on yarnsociety com pocket dino crochet along video right hand https //youtu be/ostvvekpxew left hand https //youtu be/ij-ivk6whxu bobble video tutorial right hand https //youtu be/1xrgf1hoxns left hand https //youtu be/ccm2rx30s1s beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -increasing 2 stitches into one stitch -decreasing join 2 stitches into 1 -small bobble -bobble -fastening off this no-sew crochet pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and video tutorial to help you along the way pocket dino is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round pocket dino is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 3 inches tall from top of biggest spike be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make simon the snake -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -h 5mm crochet hook -two 12mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -polyfil or stuffing of your choice -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional note if you d like to use worsted weight yarn 8mm safety eyes and an e 3 5mm crochet hook are needed pocket dino is about 2 inches tall in a small amount of worsted weight if you d like to use a bulky 5 weight worsted use an h hook and 12mm safety eyes about the same size as chenille dino do not distribute sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
